$DOT is reacting from the lower boundary of a well-defined descending channel after an extended corrective phase. Price respected channel support and downside momentum is clearly slowing, suggesting sellers are losing control at this level.


This reaction points to stabilization rather than further continuation lower. As long as the channel structure holds, focus remains on confirmation and price reaction, not chasing volatility.

$DOT Oh ohhhh Guess that price of the token actually mattered Gavin, now that we're seeing everyone leaving the project thanks for the lack of vision, the many scams that been exposed and the treasury cutoffs it became difficult to paid shillers to even push their narrative about the project..For all those years, polkadot has developped the best web3 super computer, all that to finish like a trashy project with no killer app. I've been saying that since the beginning but DOT is Betamax and ETH is VHS, Gavin spent all his time going all over the World saying we could do this or that with DOT while never even bothered to build an app that really matter in the crypto ecosystem. Guess after all that people rather go on CEX than DEX, Parity missed that conception of the market and now they drove the price action where it is actually.

$DOTSol 14_00

$DOT Ranking 32nd out of 10,000 crypto projects isn't so bad.

With the current altcoin index at 14, you can't expect too much in the current market situation.

Those who have been around longer are taking it in stride and not panicking.

Spreading panic is the wrong approach; emotional instability is often the result.
